mapper.insert: insert into first_requirement (first_requirement_id, detail, description, `sequence`, major_id) values (#{firstRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select first_requirement_id, detail, description, `sequence`, major_id from first_requirement
